Description: Steatite shabti of Ptahmes with a lappet-wig, a carved face, an incised collar, crossed hands in relief holding two incised hoes, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in four columns of incised Hieroglyphs across the sides and front of the legs and a similar central column down the back of the legs, the back is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket.
